abstract: Dmitri Rybolovlev carried out his pledge Thursday to return two Picasso works to their original owner in a brief appearance in Paris that lasted long enough for the businessman to pose alone in front of the gouache portraits valued at $30 million.
snippet: Dmitri Rybolovlev carried out his pledge Thursday to return two Picasso works to their original owner in a brief appearance in Paris that lasted long enough for the businessman to pose alone in front of the gouache portraits valued at $30 million.
